results.content:
very great course and quite understandable in terms of basic usage of ReactJS 
but i need to speed up the video abit, i think in general the course can be a little longhaired if you are not used to slow speaking video's but to top it its a very great course really worth it Thank You :=)

results.content:
I gave this rating, because the information was helpful, but the presentation  was sloppy.

Lectures are out of order, and slides are not presented professionally (slides are advanced before or well after the concept is being talked about). 

Overall, this course has valuable information and the instructor seems to know the content, but is an amateur instructor, nothing wrong with that.
results.content_html:
